value.title: Can Artificial Intelligence Ever Achieve Societal-Level Digital Trust?
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence (AI) has always been treated with suspicion, and the pace and volume of the concerns raised are reaching new highs. value.title: Googlers say Bard AI is “worse than useless,” ethics concerns were ignored
value.excerpt: From the outside, Google Bard looks like a rushed product to try to compete with ChatGPT, and some Google employees share those sentiments. A new report from Bloomberg interviews 18 current and former workers and came away with a pile of damning commentary and concerns about AI ethics teams that were "disempowered and demoralized" so Google could get Bard out the door.
